articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Theresa Laverty
articles.contents:
Theresa Laverty
          
          
          Home
          Blog
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Theresa Laverty
          
          
            
              Hi! I’m an assistant professor in the Dept. of Fish,
              Wildlife and Conservation Ecology at New Mexico State
              University. Besides wildlife ecology, I’m into hiking,
              camping, and trail running with my husband, John, and our
              dog, Bruce. I hope to post updates here for our friends
              and family on our adventures across the southwestern U.S.
              and beyond.
